body_html:
I don't have a PR. We don't do much development in git, I'm more comfortable making this change internally, but I see this is purely in Github. Could someone from the TF team undo the genrule comment change and test? (the usual tests we always run pass so I'm not sure where it failed)

We needed it in the TF repo because the other tests there were commented out here depended on it.

body:
I don't have a PR. We don't do much development in git, I'm more comfortable making this change internally, but I see this is purely in Github. Could someone from the TF team undo the genrule comment change and test? (the usual tests we always run pass so I'm not sure where it failed)

We needed it in the TF repo because the other tests there were commented out here depended on it.
